phrases: My Landing Castle is about to take its meal,
so this laser transmission will be terminated soon.
Let us wrap this up quickly, shall we?
What is the status of our rat extermination?
You need to stay in bed.
The enemy has not figured out we are here yet.
We have managed to give them the slip for the time being.
Inaho and his friends, you mean?
They say they are going to fight.
What is the deal with this?!
As soon as the citizens are evacuated, we are to abandon this base and pull out.
We have someone still fighting out there!
You are the only one left.
Captain of the amphibious assault ship Wadatsumi, 4th Fleet Escort Force.
This is Kaoru Mizusaki, my XO.
One of our people is still fighting in the northern district!
The only reason we are still secure here is because she is holding them off!
A radio jamming field is covering the entire Shinawara area.
Even if we went out to rescue her, we would not be able to pinpoint her location data.
Our responsibility is to escort and protect the ferries that are carrying refugees.
There are still people who have not made it out!
My kids' names were not on the passenger manifest!
I will put in a request to HQ to form a rescue party.
I will leave you one landing craft.
However, if you cannot put together enough people to crew her,
then I expect you to let this go.
I know that, that is why I am here.
Do you have any idea what you kids are getting yourselves into?
I am perfectly aware that it is crazy.
For some reason, that Martian is obsessed with trying to kill us.
In other words, as long as we stick to the school,
his attacks will not spread to the city proper or the harbor.
Luckily, everyone who lives around here has been evacuated.
Even so, that does not mean...
If you have to, trust your gut and make the call.
Is not that what you always tell me, Yuki?
I am pretty sure that this is one of those times.
I cannot let an injured person do this.
That is why I want you to keep them safe.
I want you to cheer up and reassure the people who are scared.
That is something that we just cannot do.
You wished for peace more than anyone, and yet...
Who would do such a thing?
So what you are saying is that not only did you fail to kill the rat,
you have even lost track of where it may have gone to hide.
With all due respect, Milord Saazbaum.
She has not eluded me just yet.
From that tunnel she fled into, she could only go to one area.
When she grows impatient and pokes her head out of her hidey-hole,
my Nilokeras' vaunted eagle eyes will immediately spot him, and-
Do you think we have the luxury of playing the waiting game?
If we do not have the rat's exact location, so be it.
We shall simply blow the entire city to kingdom come.
We shall conduct a meteor bombardment.
Count Cruhteo's Landing Castle is too close!
Would he not view that as an attack against him?
There are times when sacrifices must be made.
Orbital corrections will take several hours.
To ensure that the rat does not flee elsewhere in the meantime,
I have been collecting all we know about that Martian Kataphrakt.
The bullets you fired at it did not bounce off, they were all absorbed, were not they?
When active sensor pings hit it, they do not come back.
Infrared, acoustic detection, lasers, they are all useless.
It does not just absorb kinetic energy, but also radio waves and lasers.
I think that is the special characteristic of that wall.
The energy field that covers its surface.
Call it a barrier, I guess.
Matter, light, sound, radio waves, everything.
But if that is the case, how can he see what is on our side of the barrier?
All information from the outside is blocked by the barrier.
It is possible that he cannot see or hear anything on this side through the barrier.
In my opinion, the inside surface of that barrier appears completely black.
But if that is true, why do his attacks hit?
How can he hit anything if he is not looking?
He precisely targeted us from the other side of a building when we were running from him.
But then, even though he would been chasing us so relentlessly,
he gave up the chase the instant we ran into the tunnel.
I bet that he was not the one who was looking at what was outside the barrier.
I think that he is using some separate cameras to allow him to see, probably in the sky.
That is how he kept managing to track us no matter how far we ran,
and why he did not want to go into the tunnel.
It is because he cannot see what is in front of him when that barrier is up.
He is probably searching for us from overhead right now.
And conversely, it means we are safe as long as we stay under cover like we are now.
But the instant we go out, he will spot us.
We will probably only get one chance at this.
Oh come on, we are out of backup batteries...
And whose turn was it to check them this week?!
It will be us three heading out in the Kats.
So we need two more people for the decoy truck, right?
I feel that it is my duty to go through this time of crisis, this trial.
Our own lives will be on the line.
We carry out the plan tomorrow morning.
We are going to drive off that Martian Kataphrakt.
The student council office is pretty cold.
Yeah, the heat is turned off.
We want to minimize any signs of human habitation.
Calm is sleeping like a baby, though.
I hope he does not catch a cold.
I mean, you are worried about a cold
when you guys might die tomorrow.
It is not like I am fearless or anything.
I thought we were going to be rescued.
If that happens to us, we probably will not even know what hit us.
What kind of regrets will I have in that moment?
I cannot bear to just sit around doing nothing as I think about that.
If you are not up for it, Inko...
I will go rest up for tomorrow.
Do not catch a cold, okay?
Allow me to thank you again.
We five will now carry out the mission
to rescue friendly forces and civilians still remaining in Shinawara's northern district.
I have delegated our ferry escort duties to XO Mizusaki.
They are to rendezvous with us after the op is complete.
Let us get a move on.
I have taken an interest in you, Lt. Koichiro Marito.
That is in the direction of the school!
You will not have points deducted today!
I see it! 10 of the clock!
What in the world is that?
Hey, this was not part of the plan!
T-To your southwest, heading towards the city center.
That bat's wake is dispersing the smoke!
We have to shoot it down!
My stabilizer's gone, but I can still run, barely.
Rockets seem to work fine on that one.
It is a Vers tactical transport.
I am given to understand that it has no special equipment or capabilities
Be quiet for a minute, okay?
You have led me on quite the chase...
Run, it is me he is after!
It is 54 seconds until our estimated rendezvous time.
I shall buy us that time.
You are going to beg for your lives?
In the name of the Vers Princess Royal, I shall not tolerate this outrageous behavior!
Leave at once, you ill-mannered ruffian!
The likes of you could never scratch it!
The water is not being sucked in!
Below and to the right of the intake!
We knew that your barrier had gaps.
You cannot put up a barrier under your feet.
If you did, you would not be able to stand.
The very invincibility of your barrier makes it impossible
to completely cover yourself in it.
The receiver for your external cameras.
That is one of the barrier's gaps.
Where have you been all this time?
I have been making temporary repairs to the sky carrier...
We are leaving this place right now!
That is why I am going to kill her and make certain this time!
How big a fool are you, you inferior scum?
If I let her live, my entire clan and its followers will be branded as traitors!
You bastard, what do you think you are doing?
You were the ones who tried to assassinate the Princess!
